title: 2008 Ford F-550 Super Duty Stake Side Flatbed Truck
item_description:
2008 Ford F-550 Super Duty Stake Side Flatbed Truck

Removal Note: This lot can only be removed on Monday, November 25th, 2024, from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM. Earlier or later times will not be permitted.

Specifications

  • Year: 2008
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F-550 Super Duty
  • VIN: 1FDAF56R28EA07452
  • License: 33969L1
    • Registration Expiration: 1/31/2024
    • 12/29/21 CARB NON-COMPLIANT VEHICLE
  • Odometer Reads: 207,384
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 19,000 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: V8 Powerstroke Turbo Diesel
  • Body Style: Stake Side Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 225/70R19.5
  • Deck Length: 145”
  • Deck Width: 95”
  • Wall Height: 14”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Silver
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • Cruise Control
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Trailer Hitch
    • Air Conditioning
    • Bed Mounted Tool Boxes
    • Dual Rear Wheels

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, and Transfer without Probate will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.

CARB Truck and Bus Regulation Statement: “An on-road heavy-duty diesel or alternative-diesel vehicle operated in California may be subject to the California Air Resources Board Regulation to Reduce Particulate Matter and Criteria Pollutant Emissions from In-Use Heavy-Duty Diesel Vehicles. It, therefore, could be subject to exhaust retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants.” For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/dieseltruck.” This vehicle has been reported as a Non-Compliant Vehicle, and you may not be able to register in California without meeting the CARB Truck and Bus Regulations. It is the buyer's responsibility to read and understand the ARB Multi-Regulation Summary Requirements for Diesel Truck Owners. Beginning January 1, 2020, the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) CANNOT register any vehicle that does not meet the requirements of the Truck and Bus Regulation.
